storage.title: Storage
storage.warning_message: Below button deletes all of the data saved on your device that  is related to this app, including all exercise data, achievements, user stats etc.

remove_all_alert.header: Are you sure you want to continue?
remove_all_alert.body:
This action is irreversible. 
You'll lose all of your saved progress!

report_a_bug.title: Report a Bug
report_a_bug.mail_body:
Bug Report 


**Bug Description**

Please provide a brief description of the bug and how it occurred.

**Steps to Reproduce**

(Please describe the steps to reproduce the bug.)

**Screenshots/Logs (if applicable)**

If you have any screenshots or logs that can help, please include them.

------

Please do not edit the below data!

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.recent_achievements_placeholder_descript: Keep using Well to unlock new achievements!

1.title: Getting Started
1.description_after: You have dipped your toe into the water by completing your first exercise. Way to go!

2.title: Pleased To Meet Me
2.description_after: You’ve taken the first step by introducing yourself. Nice to meet you!

3.title: Conversation Starter
3.description_before: Added a contact to a friend and shared a conversation topic
3.description_after: You’ve opened the lines of communication by sharing a conversation topic. Keep it going!

4.title: A Foot in The Door
4.description_before: Visited Well 7 consecutive days in a row
4.description_after: Your commitment is showing! You’ve visited Well for 7 days in a row. Way to go!

5.title: User of the Month
5.description_before: Visited Well 30 consecutive days in a row
5.description_after: You’ve visited Well for 30 days in a row. Now that is impressive consistency!

6.title: Consistent Presence
6.description_before: Visited Well 180 days (not necessarily in a row)
6.description_after: You have visited Well on 180 different days. Thank you for your commitment. We hope your work is paying off!

7.title: New Year’s Resolution
7.description_before: Visited Well 365 days (not necessarily in a row)
7.description_after: A year of commitment! You’ve visited Well on 365 different days. Keep up the incredible work!

8.title: Rationalist
8.description_after: Your rational thinking is shining through! You’ve completed 20 cognitive-behavioral exercises.

9.title: Bookworm
9.description_after: You’ve broadened your knowledge by reading 10 articles. Keep feeding your curiosity!

10.title: Stoic
10.description_before: Spent over 60 minutes total on relaxation exercises
10.description_after: Your calm and composure are admirable. You’ve spent over 60 minutes on relaxation exercises.

11.title: Monk
11.description_before: Spent over 180 minutes total on relaxation exercises
11.description_after: You’ve achieved a deep state of mindfulness, spending over 180 minutes on relaxation exercises.

12.title: Philosopher
12.description_after: Your wisdom shines! You’ve shared 10 quotes, spreading thoughtful inspiration to others.

13.title: Prolific Writer
13.description_after: You’ve documented your journey with 30 journal entries. Keep expressing yourself!

stats.title: Stats
stats.visit_streak: Visited most days in a row
stats.placeholder_text: Keep using Well to see your first activity statistics!

highestVisitStreak.caption: Visited most days in a row
